content.title: Intro
content.content:
1961
Preceded by
1961
1962
Year
1963
Followed by
1963

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1962.

content.title: April
content.content:
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 237.
15 - Actor Tom Kane is born.
24 - Henry Gee is born.
? - Actress Tatyana Yassukovich is born.

content.title: July
content.content:
2 - J.R.R. and Edith Tolkien make a trip to Bournemouth.
3 - Alina Dadlez writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 238.
20 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 239.
20 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Alina Dadlez.
21 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 239a.

content.title: August
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 240.
31 - Actor Dee Bradley Baker is born.

content.title: September
content.content:
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien begins writing letter 241.
14 - An Argentinian publisher writes to J.R.R. Tolkien about a translation into Spanish of The Hobbit (El hobito).
17 - Alina Dadlez writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
19 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Alina Dadlez.
20 - Cartoonist Bill Amend is born.
? - Matt Blessing, the head of Marquette University archives, is born.

content.title: October
content.content:
13 - Tim Tolkien is born.
22 - O Gnomo, the first Portuguese translation of The Hobbit, is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 241a.
14 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to H. Cotton Minchin.
19 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 241b.
20 - C. S. Lewis writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
22 - The Adventures of Tom Bombadil is published.
22 â€“ A review in The Listener calls The Adventures of Tom Bombadil "close to genius".
23 - The literary supplement of The Times runs a review of The Adventures of Tom Bombadil.
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 242.

content.title: December
content.content:
7 - Ancrene Wisse, Tolkien's edition of a Middle English manuscript, is published.
10 - J.R.R. Tolkien is interviewed by John Bowen.
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 242a.
19 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 243.
Years
1959 1960 1961 1962 1963 1964 1965
